scripts.build: npm run lint && tsc && npm run build:dictionary
scripts.build:dictionary: style-dictionary build --config serp-style-dictionary.config.js && style-dictionary build --config static-pages-dictionary.config.js && style-dictionary build --config desktop-browsers-dictionary.config.js
scripts.lint: eslint src scripts serp-style-dictionary.config.js static-pages-dictionary.config.js desktop-browsers-dictionary.config.js && prettier src scripts serp-style-dictionary.config.js static-pages-dictionary.config.js desktop-browsers-dictionary.config.js --check
scripts.lint:fix: eslint src scripts serp-style-dictionary.config.js static-pages-dictionary.config.js desktop-browsers-dictionary.config.js --fix && prettier src scripts serp-style-dictionary.config.js static-pages-dictionary.config.js desktop-browsers-dictionary.config.js --write
